title: Thejus Homes
description: Court Doubles as a Banquet Hall
longDescription: A charming, private retreat with open, airy interiors and lush, landscaped surroundings. This villa combines modern comforts with a relaxed ambiance, providing a serene escape with a touch of luxury.

rooms.name: Room Chennellu
rooms.desc: Step into a world where comfort meets sophistication, where every detail is crafted for your ultimate relaxation. Our DOUBLE DELUXE Room is more than just a place to stay; it’s an experience. Designed with a perfect blend of modern luxury and timeless charm, this room invites you to unwind in style.

rooms.name: Room Chembavu
rooms.desc: Step into a world where comfort meets sophistication, where every detail is crafted for your ultimate relaxation. Our DOUBLE DELUXE Room is more than just a place to stay; it’s an experience. Designed with a perfect blend of modern luxury and timeless charm, this room invites you to unwind in style.

rooms.name: Room Njavara - Royal Suite
rooms.desc: Step beyond the ordinary and enter a realm of grandeur with our ROYAL SUITE, where every corner whispers elegance, and every detail exudes luxury. This is not just a room – it is a sanctuary fit for royalty, a space where lavishness meets tranquillity and where your most extraordinary dreams come to life.
